item.title: Second report of abandoned car in Darwin Road Parking bays, 11th September
item.description:

item.title: Roadworks not on website nor any end date given., 11th September
item.description:
These roadworks on Stroud Green Road do not appear on the Haringey and Islington council websites. Nor is there any indication given as to their end date. Please can this information be provided.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 45, Stroud Green Road, Stroud Green, London

item.description:

item.title: Signs & markings needed for zebra crossing, 11th September
item.description:
Issue: As per the SRA Road Safety Working Group proposals already submitted for ‘Pedestrian Crossings’, there is currently no advance warning in Station Rd to let road users know there is a zebra crossing. Requirement: ‘Pedestrian Crossing’ signage and painted ‘SLOW’ road markings are needed on the approaches on either side of the zebra crossing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queen's Mead Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog fouling, 11th September
item.description:
Noticed today, this new dog fouling. Dog fouling was cleared yesterday, today there is more in the space shown and further along the pavement and along the road going round the corner towards the local shop. Its mixed with leaves, rubbish and stepped in.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cassland Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
